title: Ep 333: Andrew Schulz, Save The Date!
itunes:title: Ep 333: Andrew Schulz, Save The Date!
description:
Bobby gives Andrew the invite he wanted. Khalyla can't find the ring. Andrew rehabilitates his relationship with Bobby. We talk Filipino martial arts, TV show Cliff Notes, Tom Arnold as Spiderman, and acting with Eddie Murphy.
